name: Projeto: Segunda Ordem
description:
In this game, the player is a detective who on any given day receives a warning from the future warning him of his death, and to avoid such a fate, the detective conducts an intense secret investigation in order to escape his own death.

“Project: Second Order” presents a narrative in the form of a detective novel set on a 2D platform in a cyberpunk universe, giving another point of view to the usual 19th century detective. This game mixes the evolution of history with gameplay developed entirely in stealth mechanics.
